snippet.title: Fractured Space : USR Destroyer
snippet.description:
The USR Destroyer is one of the largest combat ships in Fractured Space. It is equipped with 10 USR multibarrel cannons with an effective range of over 25,000m and an optimum range of 15,000m. This weapon system supports one of the largest damage outputs of any ship operating today.

It is also equipped with jamming and missile systems and its launch bays can deploy an entire squadron of bombers that can act independently from the Destroyer. 

The Destroyer is an area control vessel that uses its weapons to dominate strategically important locations from range. However, the Destroyer can be vulnerable to close range attacks and so is often paired with Protectors or fast moving attack ships that can respond to these threats.

Fractured Space is team-based space combat fought in gigantic capital ships. With the intensity of a shooter and the big-picture-thinking of a strategy game, Fractured Space is at the forefront of an exciting new frontier for the genre.

The game is available exclusively on Steam : http://store.steampowered.com/app/310380

Join us on Twitch.tv for developer live streams : http://twitch.tv/fracturedspace

Visit the official website for more information : http://fracturedspace.com
